title: あの子と、その子と、隣の子

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser steels herself against the formidable rival she's sure to face on the Triple Crown series, Mihono Bourbon.

Meanwhile, her friend Nice Nature was troubled. Upon hearing her story, it seemed she couldn't focus on training due to distractions from Tokai Teio's absence from the 'Kikuka Sho' and the public chatter surrounding it.
She asked, 'What if Tannhauser were in the same position?'
To that question, Matikanetannhauser firmly replied, 'You just have to win with enough momentum to drown out the public's words.'
Inspired by her words, Nice Nature found the courage to face things positively and successfully regained her bright expression.
